name: CloudywithaChanceofMeatballsFoodimals
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: foodimals
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Welcome to the world of Sony Pictures Animation's Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs! Inventor Flint Lockwood’s food-generating machine has gone haywire creating new animals made of food!

These new “Foodimal” pets need your help and support. Check in each day to feed your pet, teach it tricks, and play activities. 

Adopt a Foodimal today! To start your adoption process just say, “Alexa open Foodimals.”

The Cloudy with A Chance of Meatballs: Foodimals game is for kids and fans aged 6+.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This skill requires Alexa’s parental consent by an adult in the household (if not already granted). Visit https://www.amazon.com/myh/vpc/intro?clientId=Alexa_rw_vpc to give consent through your Amazon account. 

Voice purchase settings are available in your Alexa App. 

NOTE: Disabling the skill will cause you to lose your game progress.

TM & © 2020 SONY PICTURES ANIMATION. ALL RIGHTS RESERVED.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
